com.lavanya.web.controller

Class ChildcareController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lavanya.web.controller.ChildcareController

  • @Controller
public class ChildcareController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller used in MVC architecture to control all the requests related to Childcare object.

    • Method Detail

      • initBinder

        @InitBinder
public void initBinder(org.springframework.web.bind.WebDataBinder binder)

      • showChildcareRequestForm

        @GetMapping(value="/request/childcare")
public java.lang.String showChildcareRequestForm(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session,
                                                                                          org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        GET requests for /request/childcare endpoint. This controller-method displays the form for the user connected to create a childcare request. This is the first step before sending the request to the user in charge.
        Parameters:
        model - to pass data to the view.
        session - a HttpSession where attributes of interest are stored, here it concerns the token generated following user connection.
        Returns:
        requestChildcareStepOne.html

      • saveChildcare

        @PostMapping(value="/saveChildcare")
public java.lang.String saveChildcare(@Valid @ModelAttribute(value="childcareDto")
                                                                            @Valid ChildcareDto childcareDto,
                                                                            org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result,
                                                                            @ModelAttribute(value="userDtoWatchingId")
                                                                            java.util.UUID userDtoWatchingId,
                                                                            javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session,
                                                                            org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        POST requests for /saveChildcare endpoint. This controller-method is part of CRUD and is used to save in database Childcare object.
        Parameters:
        childcareDto - which is is the childcare to save.
        result - check if there is any error in the childcare object before saving it.
        userDtoWatchingId - id of the user who the request is sent to so the user in charge.
        session - a HttpSession where attributes of interest are stored, here it concerns the token generated following user connection.
        model - to pass data to the view.
        Returns:
        requestChildcareStepTwo.html.

      • completeChildcare

        @GetMapping(value="/save/request/children/{id}")
public java.lang.String completeChildcare(@PathVariable(value="id")
                                                                                            int childcareId,
                                                                                            @RequestParam(value="error",required=false)
                                                                                            java.lang.String error,
                                                                                            @RequestParam(value="name",required=false)
                                                                                            java.lang.String name,
                                                                                            javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session,
                                                                                            org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        GET requests for /save/request/children/{id} endpoint. This controller-method displays the form for the user connected to associate the children to watch to the childcare created in step one. This is the second step before sending the request to the user in charge.
        Parameters:
        childcareId - id of the childcare created in step one.
        error - only when an error exists while associating a children to watch to a childcare.
        name - of the children to watch generating an error.
        model - to pass data to the view.
        session - a HttpSession where attributes of interest are stored, here it concerns the token generated following user connection.
        Returns:
        requestChildcareStepTwo.html

      • saveChildrenToWatchToChildcare

        @PostMapping(value="/saveChildrenToWatch")
public java.lang.String saveChildrenToWatchToChildcare(@ModelAttribute(value="childrenToWatchId")
                                                                                                   int childrenToWatchId,
                                                                                                   @ModelAttribute(value="childcareId")
                                                                                                   int childcareId,
                                                                                                   javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
                                                                                            throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        POST requests for /saveChildrenToWatch endpoint. This controller-method is part of CRUD and is used to save in database ChildrenToWatch associated to a childcare.
        Parameters:
        childrenToWatchId - if of the children object to save as a childrenToWatch.
        childcareId - id of the childcare for which the children to watch is associated.
        session - a HttpSession where attributes of interest are stored, here it concerns the token generated following user connection.
        Returns:
        requestChildcareStepTwo.html.
        Throws:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException - raised when characters are not supported

      • deleteChildrenToWatchInChildcare

        @PostMapping(value="/delete/childrenToWatch")
public java.lang.String deleteChildrenToWatchInChildcare(@ModelAttribute(value="childrenToWatchId")
                                                                                                        int childrenToWatchId,
                                                                                                        @ModelAttribute(value="childcareId")
                                                                                                        int childcareId,
                                                                                                        javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
        POST requests for /delete/childrenToWatch endpoint. This controller-method is part of CRUD and is used to delete in database ChildrenToWatch object associated to a specific childcare.
        Parameters:
        childrenToWatchId - id of the childrenToWatch object to delete.
        childcareId - id of the childcare for which the children to watch is associated.
        session - a HttpSession where attributes of interest are stored, here it concerns the token generated following user connection.
        Returns:
        requestChildcareStepTwo.html.

      • completeChildcareRequest

        @PostMapping(value="/validate/request/childcare")
public java.lang.String completeChildcareRequest(@ModelAttribute(value="childcareId")
                                                                                                    int childcareId,
                                                                                                    javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
        POST requests for /validate/request/childcare endpoint. This controller-method marks a childcare as complete with all information and triggers automated notifications to the user in charge.
        Parameters:
        childcareId - id of the childcare for which the children to watch is associated.
        session - a HttpSession where attributes of interest are stored, here it concerns the token generated following user connection.
        Returns:
        childcaresRequestsDashboard.html.

      • showUserChildcaresRequestsDashboard

        @GetMapping(value="/requests/childcares")
public java.lang.String showUserChildcaresRequestsDashboard(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session,
                                                                                                       org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        GET requests for /requests/childcares endpoint. This controller-method retrieves from database all childcares requests not finalised finalised but awaiting for approval from user in charge and for childcares requests accepted. This endpoint displays all childcares requested by the user connected and allows all actions on it.
        Parameters:
        model - to pass data to the view.
        session - a HttpSession where attributes of interest are stored, here it concerns the token generated following user connection.
        Returns:
        childcaresRequestsDashboard.html

      • showUserChildcaresMissionsDashboard

        @GetMapping(value="/missions/childcares")
public java.lang.String showUserChildcaresMissionsDashboard(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session,
                                                                                                       org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        GET requests for /missions/childcares endpoint. This controller-method retrieves from database all childcares missions the user connected was requested for. This endpoint displays all childcares missions the user connected has to accept or refuse and has to accomplished for the childcares accepted. This is a dashboard where the user connected can perform several actions.
        Parameters:
        model - to pass data to the view.
        session - a HttpSession where attributes of interest are stored, here it concerns the token generated following user connection.
        Returns:
        childcaresMissionsDashboard.html

      • validateChildcareByUserInCharge

        @PostMapping(value="/validateChildcare")
public java.lang.String validateChildcareByUserInCharge(ValidateChildcare validateChildcare,
                                                                                                  javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
        POST requests for /validateChildcare endpoint. This controller-method is used to update isValidated attribute of childcare object.
        Parameters:
        validateChildcare - object that passes information to validate or not a childcare.
        session - a HttpSession where attributes of interest are stored, here it concerns the token generated following user connection.
        Returns:
        childcaresMissionsDashboard.html

      • deleteChildcare

        @PostMapping(value="/delete/childcare")
public java.lang.String deleteChildcare(@ModelAttribute(value="id")
                                                                                 int childcareId,
                                                                                 @ModelAttribute(value="personWhoDelete")
                                                                                 java.lang.String personWhoDelete,
                                                                                 javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
        POST requests for /delete/childcare endpoint. This controller-method is part of CRUD and is used to delete in database Childcare object.
        Parameters:
        childcareId - id of the Childcare object to delete.
        personWhoDelete - string to identify if the person deleting the childcare is the user in charge or in need in this specific childcare.
        session - a HttpSession where attributes of interest are stored, here it concerns the token generated following user connection.
        Returns:
        childcaresRequestsDashboard.html or childcaresMissionsDashboard.html according to the personWhoDelete.

      • markChildcareAsAccomplished

        @PostMapping(value="/markAccomplishedChildcare")
public java.lang.String markChildcareAsAccomplished(@ModelAttribute(value="childcareAccomplishedId")
                                                                                                      int childcareId,
                                                                                                      javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
        POST requests for /markAccomplishedChildcare endpoint. This controller-method is used to update isAccomplished attribute of childcare object and so mark a childcare as accomplished by the user in charge.
        Parameters:
        childcareId - id of the Childcare object to mark as accomplished
        session - a HttpSession where attributes of interest are stored, here it concerns the token generated following user connection.
        Returns:
        childcaresMissionsDashboard.html
